item.title: MEMSI 2021
item.description: Preface MEMSI is not a hackathon. MEMSI is not a business case competition. Heck, MEMSI does not even have monetary or opportunity prizes. No. The goal of MEMSI is to educate what entrepreneurship is like through simulation, immersing into one industry (for my year, it’s the aviation), and using the framework of Disciplined Entrepreneurship. Teammates MEMSI filters their participants. There’s a simple interview and threshold one must pass (Year 3 and above).
